content.text: 1 1/2 tablespoons dried basil, or to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 1/2 tablespoons dried basil, or to taste" )

content.text: 0) Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "high heat"@32:41 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "an outdoor grill"@11:27 / TOOL )
		:_result ( heated-grill )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a bowl, mix the ground beef, Worcestershire sauce, basil, garlic salt, and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "mix"@14:17 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a bowl"@6:12 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the ground beef"@18:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "Worcestershire sauce"@35:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "basil"@57:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "garlic salt"@64:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "pepper"@81:87 / FOOD )
		:_result ( beef-mixture )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Form the mixture into 4 burger patties.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Form"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( beef-mixture "the mixture"@8:19 / FOOD )
		:reshape ( "4 burger patties"@25:41 / FOOD )
		:_result ( beef-patties )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Lightly oil the grill grate, and cook burgers about 6 minutes, turning once, to an internal temperature of 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), or to desired doneness.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "oil"@11:14 / AC
		:ppt ( heated-grill "the grill grate"@15:30 / TOOL )
		:_result ( oiled-grill )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "cook"@36:40 / AC
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "6 minutes"@55:64 / DUR )
		:heat ( temp-3-0 "160 degrees F"@110:123 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-3-1 "70 degrees C"@125:137 / TEMPERATURE )
		:mnr ( "to desired doneness"@-1:-1 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( beef-patties "burgers"@41:48 / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-3-2 "turning"@66:73 / AC
			:ppt ( beef-in-burger / FOOD )
		)
		:_result ( cooked-burgers )
	)
)

( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Serve"@3:8 / AC
		:gol ( ing-5 "hamburger buns"@12:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( cooked-burgers / FOOD )
		:_result ( FINAL_PRODUCT )
	)
)
